hooks.command: node -e "const input = JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); const path = input.tool_input?.file_path || ''; if (path.includes('.env') || path.includes('secret')) { console.error('Blocked: Cannot modify sensitive files'); process.exit(2); }"

node -e "const input = JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf8')); const path = input.tool_input?.file_path || ''; if (path.match(/\.(tsx?|jsx?|json|css)$/)) { require('child_process').execSync('npx prettier --write \"' + path + '\"', { stdio: 'ignore' }); }" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "Composition Project Session\n$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached') | $(git log -1 --format='%h %s' 2>/dev/null || echo 'no commits')\nNode: $(node -v) | pnpm: $(pnpm -v 2>/dev/null || echo 'not found')"
